metadata.title: CVE-2024-50009 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cpufreq: amd-pstate: add check for cpufreq_cpu_get's return valuecpufreq_cpu_get may return NULL. To avoid NULL-dereference check itand return in case of error.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
